release.action: Mapping of string to codelist entry now possible without locale and finding of codelist more flexible.
Update of Codelists and added new ones.
Use ISO values before English values for mapping "Verweistyp".
Change behavior of some codelists to use new data field instead of separated data in entry value.
Add java parameter "-Dfile.encoding=UTF8" to start script.
Make sure to use UTF-8 encoding when being requested (in browser directly).
Fix java heap definition in start.sh.
Fix Umlaute problem on windows, now UTF-8 encoded when initially read from file.
Fix IE problem when accessing administration page, which prevented the usage completely.

Initial version of the Codelist Repository. This webapp contains an administration interface for all central managed Codelists. Codelists can be added, deleted and modified. For each Codelist several entries can be added in different languages (also ISO). With a REST-Interface the codelists can be fetched. If called with a timestamp then only updated Codelists are returned.
